g.text: [ true ] / the set button is pressed
1 : alt invariant( [R3_x_resp] ~> R3_x_resp<=300 / start time period within 0 to 300 )
[ true ] / enter in <TimedState: start time period , timing: within 0 to 300/>
1 : alt invariant( [R7_x_resp] ~> R7_x_resp<=60 / start time period within 0 to 60 )
[ true ] / enter in <TimedState: start time period , timing: within 0 to 60/>
